Does anybody have any idea how to build a System.IO.Stream-derived class to stream the video from the webcam instead of having single and seperate images?

Thanks.

Hello.

I think, that you can use DirectShow for this.
Then you can use callback methods of DirectShow filters directly or make some class (derived from Stream, for example) based on this mechanism.

I use library "Directshowlib-2005" for the similar purposes.
